author: KasHCubeD

text:
@TheSelim I disagree. It's not like apples and oranges or, as you say apples and peanut butter. They bare the same name.

imho The game was good, it just wasn't as good as the original. I suppose if I didn't compare it to the original, it'd be a great game, but I couldn't help but go into this game expecting it to be AS good as SMW2. They got rid of items, the soundtrack, the fact that it didn't take an arm and a leg to get 100%, the cool minigames. Otherwise it was a good game.
author: CarlosIsDown

text:
@TheSelim I disagree. It's not like apples and oranges or, as you say apples and peanut butter. They bare the same name.

imho The game was good, it just wasn't as good as the original. I suppose if I didn't compare it to the original, it'd be a great game, but I couldn't help but go into this game expecting it to be AS good as SMW2. They got rid of items, the soundtrack, the fact that it didn't take an arm and a leg to get 100%, the cool minigames. Otherwise it was a good game.
